name: Birds (Meirian)
description:
Click on the birds on the line to encourage them to return to their flock. Then relax. Flying birds will respond you disturbing them with the odd click, but this piece is very minimally interactive.

This is a kind of ode to bird murmations. If you haven't seen them before, google swallow murmation and watch a video and you'll see that I haven't nearly done it justice. 

We still don't know exactly how or why exactly swallows do this. It has been suggested that they simply do it for fun. 

The background music is 'Wheel' by Visible Cloaks. You can find their bandcamp here: https://visiblecloaks.bandcamp.com/.
